snippet: The police on Friday arrested a man who said he tore pages out of books related to Anne Frank at a Tokyo library.
abstract: Japanese police arrest man who said he tore pages out of books related to Anne Frank at Tokyo library.
lead_paragraph: The police on Friday arrested a man who said he tore pages out of books related to Anne Frank at a Tokyo library.

headline.main: Japan: Man Arrested in Damage to Anne Frank Books
headline.print_headline: Japan: Man Arrested in Damage to Anne Frank Books
